description: Gets all Unity Catalog metastores associated with an account specified by ID.

name.description: The user-specified name of the metastore.

storage_root.description: The storage root URL for metastore

default_data_access_config_id.description: Unique identifier of the metastore's (Default) Data Access Configuration.

storage_root_credential_id.description: UUID of storage credential to access the metastore storage_root.

INTERNAL | INTERNAL_AND_EXTERNAL.description: The scope of Delta Sharing enabled for the metastore.

delta_sharing_recipient_token_lifetime_i.description: The lifetime of delta sharing recipient token in seconds.

delta_sharing_organization_name.description: The organization name of a Delta Sharing entity, to be used in Databricks-to-Databricks Delta Sharing as the official name.

privilege_model_version.description: Privilege model version of the metastore, of the form

region.description: Cloud region which the metastore serves (e.g.,

created_at.description: Time at which this metastore was created, in epoch milliseconds.

updated_at.description: Time at which the metastore was last modified, in epoch milliseconds.

updated_by.description: Username of user who last modified the metastore.

storage_root_credential_name.description: Name of the storage credential to access the metastore storage_root.

cloud.description: Cloud vendor of the metastore home shard (e.g.,
